exits.Early Adult Spirit Temple: can_use(Silver_Gauntlets) or can_use(Hover_Boots) or (is_adult and can_shield)

locations.Spirit Temple Child Left Chest:
is_adult or
                (
                (can_use(Boomerang) or has_slingshot or has_bombchus or can_mega) and 
                (has_sticks or has_explosives or 
                    ( (has_nuts or can_use(Boomerang)) and 
                        (can_use(Kokiri_Sword) or has_slingshot) ) ))
locations.Spirit Temple Child Right Chest:
(is_adult and has_fire_source) or 
                (has_fire_source_with_torch and (as_adult_here or
                (
                (can_use(Boomerang) or has_slingshot or has_bombchus or can_mega) and 
                (has_sticks or has_explosives or 
                    ( (has_nuts or can_use(Boomerang)) and 
                        (can_use(Kokiri_Sword) or has_slingshot) ) ))))
locations.GS Spirit Temple Metal Fence:
is_adult or
            (
            (can_use(Boomerang) or has_slingshot or has_bombchus or can_mega) and 
            (has_sticks or has_explosives or 
                ( (has_nuts or can_use(Boomerang)) and 
                    (can_use(Kokiri_Sword) or has_slingshot) ) ))

locations.Spirit Temple Child Climb East Chest:
can_reach('Spirit Temple Central Chamber')
                or is_child or has_projectile(adult)
locations.Spirit Temple Child Climb North Chest:
can_reach('Spirit Temple Central Chamber')
                or is_child or has_projectile(adult)
locations.GS Spirit Temple Bomb for Light Room:
can_use(Boomerang) or can_use(Hookshot) or
                (can_child_damage and (can_live_dmg(0.5) or has_bottle or can_use(Nayrus_Love))) or 
                (is_adult and (can_live_dmg(0.5) or has_bottle or can_use(Nayrus_Love)))

locations.Spirit Temple Compass Chest:
can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) and
                (can_use(Hookshot) or can_hover) and has_projectile

locations.Spirit Temple NE Main Room Chest:
can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) and can_jumpslash and
                (can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_mega)
locations.GS Spirit Temple Lobby:
can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Boomerang) or can_hover
                or can_use(Hover_Boots)

exits.Spirit Temple Beyond Central Locked Door:
can_jumpslash and (
                can_reach('Early Adult Spirit Temple -> Spirit Temple Central Chamber',Entrance) or can_hover or
                can_use(Hookshot)) and has_explosives
exits.Spirit Temple Boss: can_use(Hookshot) and can_live_dmg(0.5) and Mirror_Shield and has_explosives

locations.Silver Gauntlets Chest:
can_reach('Desert Colossus -> Spirit Temple Outdoor Hands',Entrance) or 
                can_reach('Spirit Temple Central Chamber') or 
                (can_reach('Spirit Temple Beyond Central Locked Door -> Spirit Temple Outdoor Hands',Entrance) and 
                    (can_hover or can_use(Hookshot) or (can_use(Hover_Boots) and can_mega)))
locations.Mirror Shield Chest:
can_reach('Desert Colossus -> Spirit Temple Outdoor Hands',Entrance) or 
                can_reach('Spirit Temple Beyond Central Locked Door -> Spirit Temple Outdoor Hands',Entrance)

exits.Spirit Temple Beyond Central Locked Door:
can_hover or (can_use(Hover_Boots) and can_mega) or 
                can_reach('Spirit Temple Beyond Central Locked Door -> Spirit Temple Outdoor Hands',Entrance)
exits.Spirit Temple Central Chamber:
(can_hover or (can_use(Hover_Boots) and can_mega) or can_use(Hookshot)) and
                (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple,2)

region_name: Spirit Temple Beyond Central Locked Door
Spirit Temple Beyond Final Locked Door

locations.Twinrova Heart:
Mirror_Shield and has_explosives and 
                Progressive_Hookshot and Boss_Key_Spirit_Temple
locations.Twinrova:
Mirror_Shield and has_explosives and 
                Progressive_Hookshot and Boss_Key_Spirit_Temple
